TopicTitle: How to fix the turboject scale/offset with 0.25

Articles.Content:
Can fix the odd Turboject size by opening the \Kerbal Space Program\GameData\Squad\Parts\Engine\jetEngineTurbo\jetEngineTurbo.cfg

Replace the model = and scale = lines with

MODEL

{

model = Squad/Parts/Engine/jetEngineTurbo/model

scale = 1, 1, 1

}

Then it will fit (almost) properly (for both size and with it's assigned 1.12 attach node)

[Edit] Still slightly too small but better than it was
